props.name: value
props.description: A unique value that is never shown to the user

props.name: checked
props.description: Modifies true/false value of the native radio

props.name: defaultChecked
props.description: Selects the radio by default in uncontrolled mode

props.name: onChange
props.description: A callback function that is triggered when the input state has been changed

props.name: disabled
props.description: Modifies the native disabled state of the native checkbox
